name: Rolando Bernabe Adriano Tribo
text: Also, might be purely coincidence, but my mom's laptop's Logitech B100 mouse had a bad case of this double-click issue. I just cleaned it externally with a brush (including in between the cracks and spaces) and it seemed to have made it better / fixed it completely.    I would also check if the mouse is still under any store / manufacturer warranty and return it for repairs / replacement, if possible.
